tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nutrition_info (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(50),
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fats INT,
    serving_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE Nutritional_Information (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fats INT
);

CREATE TABLE Meal_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(255),
    meal_time TIME,
    food_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (food_id) REFERENCES Nutritional_Information(food_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Nutritional_Information (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(255),
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbs INT,
    fats INT
);

CREATE TABLE Lifestyle (
    person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Nutritional_Information (
    food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    calories INT,
    protein INT,
    carbohydrates INT,
    fat INT
  );

CREATE TABLE Meal_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    calories_limit INT,
    protein_limit INT,
    carbohydrates_limit INT,
    fat_limit INT
  );

CREATE TABLE Pilates_Workouts (
    workout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    workout_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    intensity VARCHAR(50),
    duration_minutes INT,
    calories_burned INT
  );

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    weight_kg INT,
    height_cm INT
  );

CREATE TABLE UserMeals (
    meal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    food_id INT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    amount INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (food_id) REFERENCES Nutritional_Information(food_id)
  );
